name: Deep identity
description:
Founded in 2009, Deep Identity is a Temasek Management Services company, and a member of the Temasek ecosystem. With a wealth of experience under its belt, this boutique system integrator excels in delivering tailored solutions for identity governance & administration (IGA) and identity access management (IAM) solutions, as well as the AI-powered performance workspace that caters to the diverse needs of every workforce for enhanced productivity.
 Strong Track Record for Over Ten Years  
 As a trusted partner to a fast-growing list of government agencies, local and multi-national enterprises, we have a strong track record in the delivery and implementation of complex enterprise solutions.
features: Received consistent positive feedback from customers and industry analysts for bespoke offerings, designed specifically for unique needs
Accumulated decades of experience in the delivery and implementation of complex enterprise solutions
Have built a team of trusted consultants committed to your business success and to overcoming challenges, together.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: We are your catalyst for business success
ShortDescription: Deep Identity is a Temasek Management Services company, and a member of the Temasek ecosys
enhanced_description: Deep Identity, founded in 2009 and a Temasek Management Services company, is a boutique system integrator specializing in tailored solutions for identity governance & administration (IGA) and identity access management (IAM). They also offer an AI-powered performance workspace designed to enhance workforce productivity and cater to diverse workforce needs. With over a decade of experience, Deep Identity has a strong track record in delivering and implementing complex enterprise solutions for a growing list of government agencies, local, and multi-national enterprises, consistently receiving positive feedback for their bespoke offerings and committing a team of trusted consultants to client success.
competitive_advantages: Specialization as a boutique system integrator
Delivery of tailored/bespoke solutions for unique needs
Strong track record (over 10 years) in complex enterprise solutions delivery and implementation
Consistent positive feedback from customers and industry analysts
Experienced team of trusted consultants committed to business success
